title: ICE: 'assertion failed: `(left == right)`   left: `20`,  right: `0`', compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/on_disk_cache.rs:558:5

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code You can find it at : https://github.com/wafelack/wlvm ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.48.0 (7eac88abb 2020-11-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7eac88abb2e57e752f3302f02be5f3ce3d7adfb4 commit-date: 2020-11-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.48.0 LLVM version: 11.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `20`, right: `0`', /rustc/7eac88abb2e57e752f3302f02be5f3ce3d7adfb4/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/query/on_disk_cache.rs:558:5 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.48.0 (7eac88abb 2020-11-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden error: could not compile `virtual_machine` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. ```
Backtrace
